mapper.insert: insert into JH_Auth_User_Center (ID, USER_TO, USER_FROM, MSG_TYPE, MSG_MODE_ID, MSG_CONTENT, IS_SEND, DATA_ID, MSG_LINK, WX_LINK, REMARK, READ_DATE, IS_READ, IS_CS, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgModeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isRead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isCs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select ID, USER_TO, USER_FROM, MSG_TYPE, MSG_MODE_ID, MSG_CONTENT, IS_SEND, DATA_ID, MSG_LINK, WX_LINK, REMARK, READ_DATE, IS_READ, IS_CS, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from JH_Auth_User_Center where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
